sn29.2:1.4: Andaja naga, jalabuja naga, samsedaja naga, opapatika naga.
sn29.2:1.5: Tatra, bhikkhave, andajehi nagehi jalabuja ca samsedaja ca opapatika ca naga panitatara.
sn29.2:1.6: Tatra, bhikkhave, andajehi ca jalabujehi ca nagehi samsedaja ca opapatika ca naga panitatara.
sn29.2:1.7: Tatra, bhikkhave, andajehi ca jalabujehi ca samsedajehi ca nagehi opapatika naga panitatara.
